text: Jya prakare amhi tumacyata, tumacyamadhunaca rasula (paigambara muham'mada sallallahu alaihi vasallama) yanna pathavile, jo amacya ayati (pavitra kura'ana) tumacyasamora vacuna aikavito ani tumhala svaccha sud'dha karato ani tumhala grantha ani hikamata (bud'dhimanata) sikavito ani tya gostice jnana deto, jyavisayi tumhi ajana hote
